channel.title: Where to host a server other than at home=?
channel.description: Hi, I know that i could host my server on my pc, but it laggs, and i dont and cant leave it on the whole day long. So i need a Host, but have no idea where to find a free one. I dont care if its a webhost(what might not work) Or another orginisation that does it, i just need a Host. Is there anyone who can help me out there? Please Thanks
